/apps/webscrolls/loginresult.html.body:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<!-- Run inside the monkshu framework -->
<script type="text/javascript" src="./js/index.mjs" defer></script>
<script type="module"> if (window.WEBSCROLLS_CONSTANTS) {
	const {tkmlogin} = (await import ("./3p/tkmlogin.mjs"));
	const {router} = (await import ("/framework/js/router.mjs"));
	const {loginmanager} = (await import ("./js/loginmanager.mjs")); 
 
    const verifyResponse = await tkmlogin.verify("{{{WEBSCROLLS_CONSTANTS.API_LOGIN}}}?op=verify&x-api-key={{{LOGIN_API_KEY}}}", 
		router.decodeURL(window.location.href));
	loginmanager.handleLoginResult(verifyResponse);
}
</script>
<title>{{i18n.Admin_Login}}</title>
</head>
</html>
